channel.title: Posts on Svtter's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Svtter's Blog

item.title: CNN Size Computing
item.description: CNNs (Convolutional Neural Networks) is a amazing component of neural network theory. However, to use it efficiently, we need to compute the output shape.

item.title: Easy LSTM Training Tricks
item.description: This post introduces how to train the LSTM networks to get correct outputs.

item.title: New Usage of typing module in Python
item.description: Originally, I intended to analyze django webpack; however, midway through, for the sake of rigorous documentation, I found myself having to delve into django components. Within django components, I discovered some mechanisms previously unknown to me. Consequently, let’s first discuss the typing issues encountered!

item.title: Django and Webpack
item.description:
Webpack is a modern development method for frontend projects. Django is a common backend development framework for Python developers.

I believe that developing with Webpack can make Django development faster.

item.title: Using Kind to Play with K8s
item.description:
If you directly use the online version of Kubernetes for debugging, it requires too many resources. Sometimes, using Minikube fails to start the cluster. Therefore, developers can consider using Kind to deploy and test Kubernetes.

This article is about using Kind to create a Kubernetes (K8s) cluster and debug it.
